item.title: Net Neutrality and Steve Wozniak
item.description: {% raw %} I know no one reads this blog but me, but I may as well put this up here.  Net Neutrality: I'm for it. Steve Wozniak has an excellent Open Letter up on the Atlantic about the issue.  He takes the examples of public goods such as roadworks and compares them favorably to privately managed utilities like Cable TV and Internet. Personally, I think his letter is a much more effective critique of the FCC than it is a championing of the public works model of construction.
